fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Each day, you're given a random player who has Loot at their house. (Players only have loot at their house for 1 night.)
- If another townie visits that player, they retrieve the loot for you, upgrading your abilities.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you have 2 Loot, you can steal a dead town player's ability as long as they aren't a unique or killing role. You can only steal each dead town player's ability once per game.
- When you have 3 Loot, you can reveal yourself to the town as the Plutocrat, and your vote counts as 3.
- When you have 5 Loot, you can control other players by spending one Loot.
